content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we can talk about the rental price. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 350 Euro per month is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price is too low for the apartment's quality. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 450 euros per month then?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price is still too low. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, let's go with 500 euros per month.
